snippet: A group of young men and teenagers sodomized a 15-year-old boy, critically injuring him in an attack that was recorded on video and shared among cellphones, authorities said Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Police: Teen Sodomized in Videotaped Assault
headline.main: Police: Teen Sodomized in Videotaped Assault

lead_paragraph: A group of young men and teenagers sodomized a 15-year-old boy, critically injuring him in an attack that was recorded on video and shared among cellphones, authorities said Thursday.
